name: virata.vim
description:
Virata AConfig Configuration Script Syntax
is used in AConfig scripts to build ISOS firmware.
This syntax can be detected by a combination of the following:
 1) The file extension ".hw", ".sw", ".pkg" and ".module",
 2) The file name pattern "mk.*\.cfg",
 3) The string "Virata" or "Conexant" in the first 5 lines,
 4) The subdirectory "/atmos/" in the scripts' full path.
Note that due to mergers Virata has become part of Conexant.
install_details: The virata syntax file is already located in Vim's shared syntax directory.  To use this newer version just place the file in your local user syntax directory or replace the old one.
